name: Time Taster
description:
This ninja-dude really loves sandwiches, so he created a time machine to try to steal the greatest sauce ever created from a huge corporation. Thing is, the time travels age him rapidly.

Jump and run through time in Time Taster, where you control the ninja, and have to finish the level before the time is up! Clear obstacles, collect hidden sandwiches, switch between the past, the present and the future!

Submission for Gamedev.tv's first Game Jam.

Credits: C. "Bouzinho" Bocquillon: level design, game design, testing/ T. Tavernier: art/ E. "GrossViche" Maton: programming, testing/ Everyone: game design
